casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher T. JAMES. No. 183P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of April 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-28(1)(2)(3)(4)":

*768"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
